Including Attachments with Tasks

You can include screen shots and documentation with a task or subtask by using the Attachments tab on the Task Properties dialog. Attachments can also be renamed or removed from this tab.

To add an attachment to a task:

  1. Select a folder from the folder hierarchy.

  2. Click the Task tab on the upper pane.

  3. Do one of the following:

    • Double-click a task or subtask in the task tree or list.

    • Select a task or subtask, then select Properties from the Task menu or the context menu.

    The Task Properties dialog opens.

  4. Select the Attachments tab.

  5. Click Add. The Open dialog displays.

  6. Select the file, then click Open. The selected item appears in the Attachments list.

  7. Click OK.

To rename an attachment:

  1. Select a folder from the folder hierarchy.

  2. Click the Task tab on the upper pane.

  3. Do one of the following:

    • Double-click a task or subtask in the task tree or list.

    • Select a task or subtask, then select Properties from the Task menu or the context menu.

    The Task Properties dialog opens.

  4. Select the Attachments tab.

  5. Select the file from the Attachments list.

  6. Click Save As. The Save As dialog opens.

  7. Enter a new name for the file, then click Save.

To remove an attachment from a task:

  1. Select a folder from the folder hierarchy.

  2. Click the Task tab on the upper pane.

  3. Do one of the following:

    • Double-click a task or subtask in the task tree or list.

    • Select a task or subtask, then select Properties from the Task menu or the context menu.

    The Task Properties dialog opens.

  4. Select the Attachments tab.

  5. Select the file from the Attachments list.

  6. Click Remove. The attachment is removed from the task.
